```css
// Property: repeatMode
// Component(s): Ti.Media.MusicPlayer, Ti.Media.VideoPlayer
'.repeat-mode-music-player-all': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_REPEAT_ALL }
'.repeat-mode-music-player': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_REPEAT_DEFAULT }
'.repeat-mode-music-player-none': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_REPEAT_NONE }
'.repeat-mode-music-player-one': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.MUSIC_PLAYER_REPEAT_ONE }
'.repeat-mode-video-none': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.VIDEO_REPEAT_MODE_NONE }
'.repeat-mode-video-one': { repeatMode: Ti.Media.VIDEO_REPEAT_MODE_ONE }
```
